Title: Mandates that the public service commission examine a process for streamlining actions relating to identifying and removing certain utility poles
Summary: Mandates that the public service commission examine a process for streamlining actions relating to identifying and removing certain utility poles that do not have any attachments and are no longer in use; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT mandating that the public service commission examine a process for streamlining actions relating to identifying and removing certain utility poles
